alert.note: Alert for Crook (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 4:58PM MDT until June 12 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Crook County in northeastern Wyoming... * Until 545 PM MDT. * At 458 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Carlile, or 21 miles west of Sundance, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Devils Tower Junction around 505 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Warren Peak, Sundance and Cement Ridge Lookout. This includes Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 175 and 206. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for northeastern Wyoming.
